request_0.formal_statement:
lemma linear_function_slope:
  fixes m c :: real and x1 x2 :: real
  assumes "f x = m * x + c"
  shows "f x2 - f x1 = m * (x2 - x1)"

request_1.formal_statement:
lemma slope_relation:
  fixes m :: real and x1 x2 :: real
  assumes "x1 < x2"
  shows "m = (f x2 - f x1) / (x2 - x1)"

request_2.formal_statement:
lemma linear_function_difference:
  fixes m c :: real and f :: "real \<Rightarrow> real"
  assumes "\<forall> x. f x = m * x + c"
    and "f 6 - f 2 = 12"
  shows "f 12 - f 2 = 10 * m"

request_3.formal_statement:
lemma linear_slope:
  fixes m :: real
  assumes "f 6 - f 2 = 12"
  shows "m = 3"

request_4.formal_statement:
lemma linear_function_difference:
  fixes a b m c :: real
  assumes "f x = m * x + c"
  shows "f x - f y = m * (x - y)"

request_5.formal_statement:
lemma linear_function_slope:
  fixes f :: "real \<Rightarrow> real"
  assumes "\<forall> x. f x = m * x + c"
  shows "f (x + d) - f x = m * d"

request_6.formal_statement:
lemma algebraic_manipulation:
  fixes a b c d :: real
  shows "(a + b) - (c + d) = (a - c) + (b - d)"
